description: The Sabrent DA-PH14 Splitter enables you to view one HDMI signal (rev1.4) on two displays simultaneously.Features:* Easy installation, no drivers or software needed.* 1 x HDMI input, 2 x HDMI outputs.* Supports full 3D and 4K x 2K resolution.* Supports video resolutions up to 2160p.* Supports 340MHz/3.4Gbps per channel (10.28bps all channel) bandwidth.* Supports HDCP 1.3/Supports uncompressed audio, such as LPCM.* Supports compressed audio such as DTS Digital, Dolby Digital (including DTS-HD band Dolby True-HD).Package Contents:Sabrent DA-PH14 1x2 HDMI Splitter5V DC Power SupplyUser Manuel
title: Sabrent HDMI Splitter 1x2 with 3D 4Kx2K (340MHZ) and Power Adapter (DA-PH14)
